headlines.description: Even when they look sluggish, Tom Brady and the New England Patriots still dominate.

video.headline: Bruschi: Undefeated is a dirty word in Pats' locker room

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Bruschi: Undefeated is dirty word in Pats' locker room) 2015/10/29 SC

headlines.shortLinkText: Brady leads rout of Dolphins as Pats go to 7-0

headlines.description: Alex Smith threw for 145 yards and two touchdowns, and ran for 78 yards and a touchdown to lead the Kansas City Chiefs over the Detroit Lions 45-10 Sunday at Wembley Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Smith, Chiefs run over Lions 45-10 at Wembley Stadium

video.headline: New coordinator no help for Lions' offense
Will Lions or Chiefs win the showdown in London?

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Will Lions or Chiefs win the showdown in London?) 2015/10/28 LIVE PVC

headlines.description: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers bounced back after blowing a 17-point lead, getting a 31-yard field goal from Connor Barth in overtime to beat the mistake-prone Atlanta Falcons 23-20 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bucs beat Falcons 23-20 in overtime after blowing big lead

headlines.description: Carson Palmer threw for four touchdowns -- three in the second half -- and 374 yards as the Arizona Cardinals rallied for a 34-20 win Sunday over the Cleveland Browns, who lost two defensive star

video.headline: Cardinals keep finding a way to win

headlines.shortLinkText: Palmer throws 4 TD passes as Cardinals beat Browns 34-20

headlines.description: Todd Gurley rushed for 133 yards on 20 carries, topping 100 yards for the fourth straight start to open his career, and the Rams defense shut down the San Francisco 49ers in a 27-6 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gurley leads way with 133 yards as Rams handle 49ers 27-6

headlines.description: Drew Brees passed for career highs of 511 yards and seven touchdowns, and recently signed Kai Forbath kicked a 50-yard field goal as time ran out Sunday, giving the New Orleans Saints a 52-49 vic

video.headline: Giants have no answer for Brees

headlines.shortLinkText: Brees' 7 TDs help Saints top Giants, 52-49 on last-second FG

headlines.description: Adrian Peterson ran for 103 yards and Blair Walsh kicked a 36-yard field goal as time expired to lift the Minnesota Vikings to a 23-20 win over the Chicago Bears on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Peterson, Walsh lift Vikings over Bears 23-20

headlines.description: Justin Tucker kicked a 39-yard field goal on the final play of the game, and the Baltimore Ravens overcame three touchdown passes by Philip Rivers to squeeze out a 29-26 victory over the San Dieg

video.headline: What the loss of Smith means for Baltimore

headlines.shortLinkText: Tucker's field goal lifts Ravens over Chargers 29-26

headlines.description: Andy Dalton threw a touchdown pass with 2:57 to go, and the Bengals picked off Ben Roethlisberger twice in the fourth quarter while rallying for a 16-10 victory over Pittsburgh.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dalton's late TD leads unbeaten Bengals over Steelers 16-10

headlines.description: Brian Hoyer threw for 235 yards and two touchdowns and Houston tied a franchise record with seven sacks to help the Texans to a 20-6 win over the mistake-prone Tennessee Titans on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hoyer's 2 TD passes help Texans top Titans 20-6

headlines.description: Derek Carr threw for 333 yards and four touchdowns to help Oakland pick apart the New York Jets' vaunted defense in a 34-20 victory Sunday that announced the Raiders as a legitimate contender in
headlines.shortLinkText: Carr throws 4 TD passes to lead Raiders past Jets 34-20

headlines.description: The defending NFC champions handed the Cowboys their fifth straight loss without Tony Romo as Dez Bryant returned for naught.

video.headline: Are the Seahawks a playoff contender?

headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson, Seahawks back to .500 after 13-12 win over Cowboys

venue.fullName: Sports Authority Field at Mile High

headlines.description: Denver's defense rattled Aaron Rodgers into one of the worst games of his career in the Broncos' 29-10 victory over the Green Bay Packers on Sunday night.

video.headline: Dilfer: Packers need to solve pass-rush problems

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Dilfer: Packers need to address pass rush problems) 2015/11/01 SC

headlines.shortLinkText: Broncos limit Rodgers to 77 yards, move to 7-0

headlines.description: Graham Gano kicked a 52-yard field goal in overtime to lift the Panthers to a 29-26 win over the Indianapolis Colts on Monday and keep Carolina the NFC's only remaining unbeaten team.

video.headline: Panthers' key players step up when it matters most

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Panthers' key players step up when it matters most) 2015/11/02 SC

headlines.shortLinkText: Gano's kick lifts Panthers after Colts rally for OT
